mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_T(JNAME, `TO`, JDETAIL, JTYPE, `REQUIRE`, EXTRA, PLACE, WID) VALUES ( #{jname}, #{to}, #{jdetail}, #{jtype}, #{require}, #{extra}, #{place}, #{wid} )
mapper.select: SELECT JID FROM JOB_T WHERE JNAME = #{jname} AND `TO` = #{to} AND REQUIRE = #{require} AND WID = #{wid} ORDER BY JID DESC LIMIT 1
